sentences.en: Carman Kass looked girlie in a black ruffle chiffon dress.
sentences.cn: 身着黑色褶边薄纱裙的卡门?卡斯看起来仿若少女.

sentences.en: Carman: This happens all the time. What did you do when the ring failed to arrive?
sentences.cn: 卡门: 这是经常发生的事. 你不见指环送来,当时怎麽办?

sentences.en: She afraid of the trauma her mother's rejection of Carman might cause the little girl.
sentences.cn: 她担心卡门的妈妈抛弃卡门会给小女孩带来精神上的创伤.

trans.tran_cn: 运货马车的车夫，电车的车长
trans.tran_en: a man who drives a car or cart; carter
